name: performance
description: The worst way to create a Flask <-> psycopg app

scripts.db-run: docker run -it -p 5432:5432 --name postgre-database-container --env-file ./database/.env --cpus 0.20 --memory 200M --network flask-perf-net --network-alias database postgre-database-image
scripts.good-flask-run: docker run -it -p 3000:3000 --name web-server-container -v "$(pwd)/Good Flask Postgres:/usr/src/app" --cpus 0.20 --memory 200M --network flask-perf-net web-server-image
